title: Please fix it.

replies.body: Indeed, as Zevrin mentioned summoner icon gifting is [currently disabled ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)due to an issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Approximately when "Gift icon to a friend" back?

From Riot Service Status page

_**Network Operations â€“ 09/30/2016
Due to a technical issue, icon gifting is disabled for the duration of Worlds (through October 29).**_

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na

Sorry if you need it sooner :(
